title: Ticket #1569: Discrepancies between comments and code for UserPolicy object
description:
Several comments for the UserPolicy object do not match what the code does. Here are several examples:
  • ATTR_PERIODIC_RELEASE_CHECK is checked before ATTR_PERIODIC_REMOVE_CHECK, but the comments don't list it. 
    	/*	The user_policy is checked in this
			order. The first one to succeed is the winner:

			ATTR_TIMER_REMOVE_CHECK
			ATTR_PERIODIC_HOLD_CHECK
			ATTR_PERIODIC_REMOVE_CHECK
			ATTR_ON_EXIT_HOLD_CHECK
			ATTR_ON_EXIT_REMOVE_CHECK
	*/
  • ATTR_TIMER_REMOVE_CHECK is not assigned a default and inserted into the classad, but the comments say otherwise. 
    /* ok, here is the first set of expressions that should be available
	in the classad when it is given to Init():

	ATTR_TIMER_REMOVE_CHECK
	ATTR_PERIODIC_HOLD_CHECK
	ATTR_PERIODIC_REMOVE_CHECK
	ATTR_PERIODIC_RELEASE_CHECK
	ATTR_ON_EXIT_HOLD_CHECK

	If any of the above attributes are not present, then they will
	be assigned defaults and inserted into the classad.
check_ins: 2010-Aug-12 11:46   Check-in [18786]: Updated comments for the UserPolicy object to match the code. (#1569) (By Josh Slauson )
creator: slauson
